schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

step_run.description: Reference to analysis step run in pipeline
step_run.title: Analysis step run

___href.comment: Internal webapp URL for document file

quality_metric_of.description: One or more files that this metric either applies to or is calculated from.
quality_metric_of.title: Files

items.description: A particular file associated with this quality metric.
items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.
items.title: File

description: Schema for reporting 'edwBamStats' output as a quality metric
title: edwbamstats quality metric

___u4mReadCount.description: Number of randomly sampled uniquely mapped items used in complexity calculation
___u4mReadCount.title: # of random sampled unique reads

___u4mUniqueRatio.description: Ratio of unique positions to uniquely mapped reads
___u4mUniqueRatio.title: Ratio of unique positions to uniquely mapped reads

___readBaseCount.description: Count of total bases in reads
___readBaseCount.title: # of bases in reads

___u4mUniquePos.description: Number of unique positions that sampled uniquely mapped reads were mapped to
___u4mUniquePos.title: # of positions sampled unique reads map to

___targetBaseCount.description: Number of bases covered in target (e.g. on chromosomes)
___targetBaseCount.title: # of covered bases in target

___isSortedByTarget.description: If the bam is sorted by target location, this is set to 1; if sorted by name, this is set to 0
___isSortedByTarget.title: Is sorted by target flag

___isPaired.description: If alignment is from paired-end reads this will be set to 1
___isPaired.title: Is paired end flag
